body:

replies.body: mordekaiser doesn't get mentiond boohoo, lots of mains don't get mentioned, live with it
i don't recall other champs having 200+ bugs with a feast or famine kit
No other champion in League has 200+ unresolved bugs and can lose games through one of them suddenly appearing (like his ult not giving him the HP sometimes).
once i didn't get the drake when we killed it
I got him on ARAM once, my Q did no damage if Sona used her Q prior to your AAing.

> [{quoted}](name=hhaavviikk,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3M7XOw1q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-06T20:27:18.181+0000)
>
> mordekaiser doesn't get mentiond boohoo, lots of mains don't get mentioned, live with it

When was the last time your main got nerfed/buffed or even bugfixed? Try again.

Mordekaiser is, without a doubt now that Nunu is being reworked, the most janky and outdated champion in the entire game. He has probably top 10 most badass themes to work with and a newer version of Children of the Grave could be an insane mechanic which Riot loves these days. 

Mordekaiser could've been one of the very first VGUs. I wouldn't have been shocked if he was chosen first instead of Sion or Poppy years and years ago, yet somehow 4 years after they started going into overdrive on VGUs he still exists. They keep adding tier 1 champions to the VGU pool when really Mordekaiser deserves to be tier 0. He's so, SO outdated and has so many bugs. He should've been right there with Sion and Poppy yet he continues to be shafted and ignored.
No other champion has a "feature" that DCs the whole game
